text: This doesn't seem quite right: Did anyone know the NBA banned wearables? <http://espn.go.com/nba/story/_/id/15143072/whoop-future-wearable-technology>

attachments.title: Matthew Dellavedova, the 'Whoop' and the upcoming battle over wearable technology
attachments.text: ESPN's Tom Haberstroh explores the coming collective bargaining fight over wearable technology in the NBA.
